title: LoL Animated: Shrooms

embed.description: So basically flying champs shouldn't be able to hit Teemo shrooms. Rito please fix this gamebreaking bug. Everything done by PentaMagic :D Don't forget to like, comment and subscribe! League of Legends Animated isn't endorsed by Riot Games and doesn't reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing League of Legends.

body: So I found a gamebreaking bug with Teemo's shroom interaction with certain champions

replies.body: haha so good! your youtube channel is pure gold

Nice one Penta!!!
I'd love to continue our chat about the series when you have time :)
Yea awesome, I'm generally free most of the time (as my animating hours are very flexible). If you see me online on LoL just hit me up :)
Omgosh! Thats so epic! After watching that one I watched all of yours. So cool, what program(s) did you use?
Hey man! I use Adobe Flash to do all the animation, and Adobe Premiere Pro to piece together, render and export it as an mp4 :)
Top kek m9 I rate it gud
